alert.note: Alert for Camden; Dallas; Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 12:48AM CDT until April 11 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Camden County in central Missouri... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1248 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Urbana, or 12 miles north of Buffalo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ha Ha Tonka State Park... Urbana... Stoutland... Louisburg... Eldridge... Leadmine... Tunas... Pumpkin Center... Sleeper... Branch... Decaturville... Plad... Montreal... Wet Glaize... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 135 and 143. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
